originalPrompt: Educational illustration for "Quantum Entanglement: Spooky Action at a Distance!": Create an educational illustration that explains What is Quantum Entanglement?. Context: Quantum entanglement is a bizarre phenomenon where two tiny particles become linked, sharing the same fate regardless of the distance separating them.  Even if they're light-years apart, measuring the property of one instantly reveals the corresponding property of the other – like two magically connected coins.
